{{Wired embedded system |brand=MikroTik |model=RouterBOARD hEX |revision=(RB750Gr2) |asin=B016E93IQS;US; |price=59.95 |est_release_date=10/09/2015 |manuf_country=Latvia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=common |type=router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |cpu1_model=QCA9556;QCA9556-AR4A; |cpu1_cspeed=720 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q128FVSG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16EG-AC |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C-R; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=RouterBOOT |stock_os=RouterOS;Level 4; |default_ip=192.168.88.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass= |oui_eth=4C:5E:0C }} '''Gigabit Home Ethernet Router (hEX)''' :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr2 Product Page] (r2) | [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/hardware/routers/mikrotik_hex PPage] (RU) :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr3 Product Page] (r3) *[[MikroTik]]
===See also=== ====Ethernet routers==== *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX v3 (RB750Gr3)]] [http://forum.mikrotik.com/viewtopic.php?f=3&t=113068 ''MikroTik'' forums] :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr3 RB750Gr3] ('''hEX v3''') - 5x GbE ports, 16/256MB, RouterOS L4 (6.36.1) :CPU: [[MediaTek]] [[MediaTek MT7621A|MT7621A]] @880MHz Dual Core (MIPS 1004Kc V2.15) *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX (RB750Gr2)]] [http://mikrotik.ru/katalog/katalog/hardware/routers/mikrotik_hex PPage] (RU) :[http://routerboard.com/RB750Gr2 RB750Gr2] ('''hEX''') - 5x GbE ports, 16/64MB, RouterOS L4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9556-AR4A @720MHz (MIPS 74Kc V5.0) *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX lite (RB750r2)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB750r2 RB750r2] ('''hEX lite''') - 5x FE ports, 16/64MB, RouterOS L4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9533-BL3A-R @850MHz *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD hEX PoE lite (RB750UPr2)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB750UPr2 RB750UPr2] ('''hEX PoE lite''') - 5x FE ports, PoE, USB, 16/64MB, OS L4 :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz *[[MikroTik RouterBOARD PowerBox (RB750P-PBr2)]] :[http://routerboard.com/RB750P-PBr2 RB750P-PBr2] ('''PowerBox''') - 5x FE ports, PoE, 16/64MB, OS L4, PSU :CPU: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9531 @650MHz
